reviewText: True Romance, another good flick that's similar. Not on DVD, as far as I can tell, hard to find in stores..

Love this film. Saw it years ago and knew it was a hidden gem. Stephen Baldwin and Emily Lloyd were fantastic together.  Chris Penn is awesome as a psychotic escaped convict. The whole film has a nice vibe. I recommend it.
This is a great indie comedy starring Stephen Baldwin about a bunch of Hawaiian wannabees living a boring existance in Arizona. It's a must see action/comedy!!
